name: Burger
author: Solomon Vana
instructions: First mix the ground beef with the salt and pepper. Then, form the mixture into patties. Next, melt the butter in a pan and add the paddies. Cook to desired level and serve. Makes 4 patties
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp pepper, 1 tbsp butter

name: Kidney Bean Hotdish
author: Kelley Rooney
instructions: Brown hamburger while cooking macaroni as directed on package. Drain both and mix together with remaining ingredients. Salt and pepper to taste and heat thoroughly.
ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger, 2 c. dry macaroni, 2 cans tomato soup, 2 cans kidney beans, 1/2 c. ketchup, salt & pepper

name: Fudge Bars
author: Anne Hackenmueller
instructions: Combine yellow cake mix, eggs, and melted stick of margarine. Press 2/3 of this mixture into greased 9x13 pan. Melt the chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, and 2 tbsp. of melted margarine and stir this until smooth. Pour this over the cake mixture in the pan. Take remaining 1/3 cake mixture and splotch over cake. Bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix, 2 eggs, 1 stick of melted margarine, 1 regular-sized bag of chocolate chips, 1 can sweetened condensed milk, 2 tbsp. melted margarine

name: Scones
author: Britta Williams
instructions: Stir together flour, powdered sugar, sugar, and salt. Cut shortening into these dry ingredients. Add in eggs, milk, and vanilla. Turn onto floured surface and shape into a 2-inch thick round. Cut into 6 pie-shaped pieces and place on greased & floured baking sheet. Bake at 375 degrees Fahrenheit for 15-20 minutes or until golden. Serve with butter and jam.
ingredients: 2 c. flour, 1 tbsp. powdered sugar, 1/4 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2/3 c. shortening, 2 eggs, 1/4 c. milk, 1 tsp. vanilla extract
